mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a photograph of the building at 28-30 North Main Street, Lexington, Virginia printed on a postcard. The message space reads, "Friday. Be sure and send suit to Babe [?] I left it at Mrs. Williams. Will be home until Sunday. yours. Mrs. C M W." The postcard is addressed to Mr. C. M. Wood, V. U. University, Richmond, Va. Unfortunately the postmark is not legible. There is a note added in another hand, "H. L. Walker, Eliza [ditto], Ed Walker, Wm Tyree, Rob Poindexter, Abner Greenlea, Buzz Lindsey."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mrs. C. M. Wood to Mr. C. M. Wood (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Letters
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Sr.
